title: Now 7 Years Later
brief_description: NOW7 YEARS LATER is a video and sculptural installation, and was first staged at the Fremantle Arts Centre as a commission in response to the 50th anniversary of the City of Fremantle’s collection of art.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

description: NOW7 YEARS LATER is a video and sculptural installation, and was first staged at the Fremantle Arts Centre as a commission in response to the 50th anniversary of the City of Fremantle’s collection of art.
